lead_paragraph: Captain Graeme Cremer scored his maiden test century on Monday to help Zimbabwe avoid the follow-on as they scored 373 in reply to Sri Lanka’s 537 in the first test.

headline.print_headline: Cricket-Cremer Rises to the Top to Rally Zimbabwe
headline.main: Cricket-Cremer Rises to the Top to Rally Zimbabwe
